body.headline: [I] IRB Infra Trust to raise up to 28.62 bln rupees via rights issue
body.text:
Informist, Wednesday, Jul 19, 2023

 

MUMBAI – IRB Infrastructure Trust's board on Tuesday approved raising up to 28.62 bln rupees through a rights issue, according to an exchange filing today.

 

The trust will issue units to eligible unitholders as on the record date, which will be notified subsequently, in accordance with the applicable provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India InvIT Regulations and other applicable law.

 

IRB Infrastructure Trust is a "Private Trust", registered under the Indian Trusts Act 1882 and SEBI's Infrastructure Investment Trusts Regulations 2014. The Trust is held by IRB Infrastructure Developers Ltd as sponsors with stake of 51% and 49% by GIC.  End

 

Reported by Pooja Sawant

Edited by Ashish Shirke

 

For users of real-time market data terminals, Informist news is available exclusively on the NSE Cogencis WorkStation.

 

Cogencis news is now Informist news. This follows the acquisition of Cogencis Information Services Ltd by NSE Data & Analytics Ltd, a 100% subsidiary of the National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. As a part of the transaction, the news department of Cogencis has been sold to Informist Media Pvt Ltd.
